titlestmt.titleproper: Ludlow Street Sunday-School Missionary Society records 1882-1897
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Ludlow Street Sunday-School Missionary Society records

bioghist.p: The Ludlow Street Sunday-School Missionary Society was formed in 1882 for the purpose of encouraging and extending mission work.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one volume of minutes and related records of the Ludlow Street Sunday-School Missionary Society, 1891-1897. The volume also includes the Society's constitution and a list of the board of managers from 1882-1891.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Presbytery of New York City
